pageContext.claim: “The crisis of illegal immigration impacts all Americans -- threatening public safety, overwhelming public resources, straining our local schools and hospitals, undermining U.S. workers, and claiming countless innocent lives.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump paints a scary portrait here at odds with data that show that undocumented immigrants are a net plus for the U.S. economy, especially when the impact of their children is included. There is little research that indicates undocumented immigrants commit more crimes than U.S. citizens. In fact, it is more likely they commit less crime.
